description.physical: Petite, keeps her head down. Always wears large over-ear headphones to block out ghost whispers.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Mina Kim
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Petite, keeps her head down. Always wears large over-ear headphones to block out ghost whispers.
Visual details: short black bob hair, pale skin, large white headphones, oversized beige cardigan, tired dark circles under eyes, clutching a sketchbook
Personality (for expression): Introverted, observant, compassionate but fearful.
